nodes.body: bdag bskyed. Often another name for sgrub thabs. TBRC T457 has bdag ‘jug and bdun bkyed in the same category, which is not advisable. Ex: Zhi khro dgongs pa rang grol gyi bdag bskyed mdor bsdus (W20608).
nodes.title: About Generation of self as the deity
